meanings.definition: Engaging in physical activity to improve health and fitness.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys exercising at the park every morning.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend exercising regularly for a healthy lifestyle.
meanings.sent3: Exercising with friends can make the workout more fun.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to exercising is like a daily ritual.
meanings.sent5: The benefits of exercising include increased energy and strength.

meanings.sent1: He is exercising his right to free speech.
meanings.sent2: Exercising caution when crossing the street is important.
meanings.sent3: Exercising good manners is always appreciated.
meanings.sent4: She is exercising her authority as a team leader.
meanings.sent5: Exercising patience in difficult situations can lead to better outcomes.

meanings.definition: Using or applying a skill or ability.
meanings.sent1: The exercising chef prepared a delicious meal for us.
meanings.sent2: She is an exercising artist, always creating beautiful works.
meanings.sent3: His exercising knowledge of computers helped solve the problem.
meanings.sent4: The team's exercising teamwork led to a successful project completion.
meanings.sent5: Her exercising creativity knows no bounds.
